helpers: Various helpers for single element quick fixes. Helper classes should be able to used anywhere at anytime with no dependencies or over specific styling e.g., `text-align: center;` with a helper class of `.u-text-center` All helper classes are prefixed with the 'u-' namespace('U' for utility) for readability purposes for developers.
elements: Styled html elements used as building blocks of modules and throughout the website.
modules: Styled and re-usable components comprised of multiple elements that can stand alone providing content and allowing interaction for the user.
